title: SoC THEATRE 367-0-20 Music Theatre History

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: The goal of this course is to provide you with a context within which to understand the history of musical theatre while cultivating your own opinions about the art form and how it relates to society. This course is a research based course. You will research and discussion topics weekly, followed by weekly presentations. These topics are assigned by era so that we may analyze and compare the material to the history of society. You will also apply your growing knowledge of musical theatre history whileengaging in discussion with your peers. Throughout the course there will be group discussions, group research, independent research, group presentations and writing responses to prompts, which will require critical thinking and self reflection. There will be weekly readings, weekly presentations and two papers due.
